timeline.description: Updated legacy single page application. Lead redesign of a user review page in team.
Developed form-submitting single page applications. Contributed to design systems. Help design contracts between backend and frontend.
Developed webpages to gather research group information. Released old-form mobile apps.
Maintained ads management infrastructure. Developed node applications to serve ad data in real time. Designed new database collections. Orchestrated AWS services with in-house services.
Maintained and improved in-house C++ & Redis system for the 2014 Barcelona World Race.
Deployed and monitored services world-wide. Used logs and metrics to solve production bugs. Contributed to on-call runbooks.
Used CI + CD to deploy Frontend and Backend microservices. Fixed CI + CD manifestos to accomodate growing releases.
Contributed to data flow of ads interactions. Designed new dataframes to create ad expenses reports and to improve ad monitoring. Built and maintained the daily pipeline of the scripts.

summary: Worked in cross-functional teams with Scrum and/or Agile development. Contributed to TDD and/or BDD. Used team workload managers (Jira, Confluence). Also worked in Cascade style environments.

timeline.description: Webpage projects such as an interactive 3.5 DnD character sheet builder
Indie scale games and projects for game jams like Ludum Dare.
Procedural image generation and graphics' snippets
Unreal Engine 5 and triple A game dev courses.
Write QA automated tests and added them to the CI pipeline. Designed meta-testing systems (automated webpage screenshotting across browsers to spot differences).
Reviewed business requirements, wrote tests suites and cases. Coordinated team releases and bug reports.
